render

Class RenderProcMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • render.Render
      • render.RenderProcMesh

  • public class RenderProcMesh
extends Render
    Draws a list of Tracer objects as a procedural mesh. When two Tracers get within a certain distance of each other, a line is drawn between them.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]
